Package crypto

Class CryptoManager

java.lang.Object
crypto.CryptoManager
public class CryptoManager extends Object
Cryptography Manager. Implementation of RSA and ElGamal.
Since:
17.10.2025

  • Constructor Details

    • CryptoManager

      public CryptoManager()

  • Method Details

    • generateKeyPair

      public static KeyPair generateKeyPair(String algorithm, int keySize)
      Generates a public/private key pair for the specified encryption algorithm.
      Parameters:
      algorithm - The name of the algorithm to use (e.g., "RSA" or "ElGamal").
      keySize - The size of the key in bits (e.g., 2048, 4096).
      Returns:
      A KeyPair containing the generated public and private keys.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the specified algorithm is not supported.

    • encrypt

      public static byte[] encrypt(String data, PublicKey key)
      Encrypts plaintext data using the provided Public Key.
      Parameters:
      data - The plaintext to encrypt.
      key - The Public Key to use for encryption (must be an instance of RSAPublicKey or ElGamalPublicKey).
      Returns:
      A byte array containing the encrypted data (ciphertext).
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the key type is unknown or encryption fails.

    • decrypt

      public static String decrypt(byte[] encryptedData, PrivateKey key)
      Decrypts ciphertext data using the provided Private Key.
      Parameters:
      encryptedData - The byte array containing the ciphertext.
      key - The Private Key (must be an instance of RSAPrivateKey or ElGamalPrivateKey).
      Returns:
      The plaintext string.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the key type is not supported or decryption fails.

    • decodePublicKey

      public static PublicKey decodePublicKey(Algorithm algorithm, byte[] encodedData)
      Reconstructs a Public Key from its byte representation.
      Parameters:
      algorithm - The algorithm type (RSA_4096 or EL_GAMAL).
      encodedData - The byte array containing the encoded key string.
      Returns:
      A valid PublicKey object reconstructed from the data.

    • generateRSAKeyPair

      private static KeyPair generateRSAKeyPair(int keySize)
      Generates an RSA key pair.

      Generates two large random prime numbers to calculate the modulus n and the private exponent d. The public exponent e is fixed at 65537.

      Parameters:
      keySize - The total bit length of the modulus (e.g., 4096).
      Returns:
      A KeyPair containing the RSAPublicKey and RSAPrivateKey.

    • encryptRSA

      private static byte[] encryptRSA(String data, RSAPublicKey key)
      Encrypts data using the RSA algorithm.
      Parameters:
      data - The plaintext message to encrypt.
      key - The custom RSAPublicKey containing modulus n and exponent e.
      Returns:
      A byte array representing the encrypted string.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the length of the message is too large for the specified key size.

    • decryptRSA

      private static String decryptRSA(byte[] data, RSAPrivateKey key)
      Decrypts data using the RSA algorithm.
      Parameters:
      data - The encrypted byte array (representing the ciphertext).
      key - The custom RSAPrivateKey containing modulus n and private exponent d.
      Returns:
      The original plaintext string.

    • generateElGamalKeyPair

      private static KeyPair generateElGamalKeyPair(int keySize)
      Generates an ElGamal key pair based on the Discrete Logarithm Problem.
      Parameters:
      keySize - The bit length of the prime modulus (e.g., 1024).
      Returns:
      A KeyPair containing the custom ElGamalPublicKey and ElGamalPrivateKey.

    • encryptElGamal

      private static byte[] encryptElGamal(String data, ElGamalPublicKey key)
      Encrypts data using the ElGamal algorithm.
      Parameters:
      data - The plaintext message to encrypt.
      key - The custom ElGamalPublicKey containing parameters p, g, and y.
      Returns:
      A byte array containing the packed string representation "c1|c2".
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the length of the message is larger than the prime modulus p.

    • decryptElGamal

      private static String decryptElGamal(byte[] data, ElGamalPrivateKey key)
      Decrypts data using the ElGamal algorithm.
      Parameters:
      data - The encrypted byte array (representing the packed "c1|c2" string).
      key - The custom ElGamalPrivateKey containing parameters p and x.
      Returns:
      The original plaintext string.

    • saveKey

      public static void saveKey(Key key, String filePath)
      Serializes and saves a cryptographic Key to a file.
      Parameters:
      key - The key object to save.
      filePath - The file system path where the key should be stored.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If an I/O error occurs while writing to the file.

    • loadPublicKey

      public static PublicKey loadPublicKey(String filePath)
      Deserializes and loads a Public Key from a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file containing the serialized key.
      Returns:
      The reconsructed PublicKey object.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the file cannot be read or the object is not a valid PublicKey.

    • loadPrivateKey

      public static PrivateKey loadPrivateKey(String filePath)
      Deserializes and loads a Private Key from a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file containing the serialized key.
      Returns:
      The reconstructed PublicKey object.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the file cannot be read or the object is not a valid PublicKey.
